Description: Limestone stele; epitaph on Herakleides in ten lines; part of relief above of deceased and dog(?); top lost. A poorly composed epitaph of five elegaic couplets for one Herakleides who died, presumably, just before his marriage was to take place.
Bibliographic references: Inscription / The Collection of Ancient Greek Inscriptions in the British Museum (1084)
Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXI, no. 11)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (CC.08)
